title: Robbie Henshaw and Johnny Sexton to return for Ireland in crucial Samoa match
text:
Robbie Henshaw will make his first appearance of the World Cup against Samoa on Saturday. The Leinster centre has been named in the Ireland team to face the Pacific Islanders after recovering from a hamstring strain.

Johnny Sexton returns at fly-half for a game Ireland must win with a bonus point in order to guarantee a quarter-final spot. Should Ireland lose or win without a bonus point on Saturday, they will have to wait on the result of the Scotland-Japan game the following day - a match which is under serious threat from the weather.

Should it be cancelled, Ireland would only need one point from their clash with Samoa to make sure of qualifying although they would not be able to top the pool....
description: Robbie Henshaw will make his first appearance of the World Cup against Samoa on Saturday.
